episodes.title: 12: The Story of Glory (W/ Martha Kartaoui)
episodes.description: This was a very special episode, please listen as I talk with Martha. Martha has an incredible story. Beginning with her life in a religious cult, finally realizing it was time to leave and beginning an amazing new life on the other side. Its a story of courage, transformation, healing and inspiration. Here is a brief overview of what we discussed... Growing up in a religious cult Life altering decisions Escaping the cult Beginning a new life Healing New adventures and opportunities Martha Glory Kartaoui: Martha Kartaoui is a highly accomplished Certified Life and Health Coach, as well as a respected Spiritual Mentor and Life Visionary. She's the owner of PIC Wellness, LLC. With a remarkable personal journey as a survivor of a religious cult, Martha has fearlessly navigated her own uncharted healing journey and transformed her trauma into triumph. Through her own healing and growth, she has discovered a deep passion for empowering others to do the same, and has created a Trauma Recovery Coaching Program: Going All In. With her expertise and compassionate guidance, Martha is dedicated to assisting individuals on their path from being mere survivors to warriors in their own lives while learning tools to triumph over adversity and unlock their God given truest and highest potential. Her unique blend of professional training, personal experience, and spiritual wisdom enables her to walk alongside and support her clients profound transformations. Martha Kartaoui is a beacon of hope and inspiration, offering invaluable accountability, motivation and support to those seeking to reclaim their lives in order to thrive in their own journey towards self-discovery and divine fulfillment. Martha shares her own journey from Cult Survivor to Courageous Warrior in her book Glory: Going All In, coming out in June. Connect With Martha: www.linkedin.com/in/martha-kartaoui-a7840b291 https://www.facebook.com/martha.kartaoui?mibextid=ZbWKwL https://instagram.com/marthakartaoui?igshid=OGQ5ZDc2ODk2ZA==
